title: Earthing System Requirements
fullText:
The earthing system shall be arranged so that—
• (a) the effectiveness of the earthing system is not impaired by mechanical, chemical or electrochemical effects; and
• (b) the earth fault current that the earthing system is required to carry does not cause thermal effects that would damage the system or any other installation; and
• (c) any fault current likely to be conducted through the earthing system does not cause dangerous effects from electric shock or fire.
